00025 #ifndef _BASE_VARIABLEEXPRESSION_
00026 #define _BASE_VARIABLEEXPRESSION_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/ConstantExpression>
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace base {
00033 
00034 
00035 //
00036 // Expression that evaluates to a specific parameter variable from the params Vector
00037 //
00038 
00039 class VariableExpression : public ExpressionNode
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   VariableExpression(Int paramsIndex)
00043     : index(paramsIndex) {}
00044   VariableExpression(const VariableExpression& e)
00045     : index(e.index) {}
00046 
00047   virtual NodeType type() const { return NodeType(Leaf|Variable); } 
00048 
00049   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj VariableExpression(*this); }
00050   virtual String className() const { return String("VariableExpression"); }
00051 
00052   virtual String toString() const { return String("p[")+base::intToString(index)+"]"; }
00053 
00054   virtual void serialize(Serializer& s) { s(index,"index"); }
00055 
00056 protected:
00057   VariableExpression() {}
00058   
00059   virtual void cacheValue(const Vector& params) const
00060     { 
00061       if (index >= params.size())
00062         throw std::invalid_argument(Exception(String("Expression refers to variable index not present in evaluation parameter vector:")+base::intToString(index)));
00063       value = params[index]; valueCached=true; 
00064     }
00065   virtual void resetCache() const { valueCached=false; }
00066 
00067   virtual void cacheDerivative(Int withRespectToIndex) const 
00068     {
00069       derivative = ref<ExpressionNode>(NewObj ConstantExpression(( index==withRespectToIndex)?1:0 ));
00070       derivWithRespToIndex = withRespectToIndex;
00071       derivCached = true;
00072     }
00073   virtual void resetDerivCached() const { derivCached=false; derivative = ref<ExpressionNode>(0); }
00074 
00075   virtual void operationCounts(Int& addsub, Int& multdiv, Int& trig) const 
00076     {}
00077 
00078   Int index;
00079 
00080   friend class Expression;
00081   friend class Serializable::SerializableDerivedInstantiator<VariableExpression>;
00082 };
00083 
00084 } // base
00085 
00086 #endif
